projects.name: Digital Twin MCP Server
projects.description: Enterprise-grade AI digital twin using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture to provide intelligent, contextual responses about professional background and expertise. Achieved 85%+ recruiter satisfaction rate with STAR-format interview responses.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive digital twin system that represents professional identity through AI. Built with advanced RAG architecture, multi-provider AI system (Groq + OpenAI fallback), intelligent caching for 60-80% cost reduction, and real-time analytics. Includes interview optimization framework with STAR method integration and company-specific response customization.
features: MCP server integration with Claude Desktop

projects.name: Food RAG Explorer
projects.description: Intelligent food recommendation system providing insights about 105 different food items based on country and dietary preferences using vector-based similarity search and real-time AI insights.
projects.longDescription: AI-powered web application that uses RAG architecture to deliver intelligent food recommendations. Successfully migrated from local setup (Ollama + ChromaDB) to production cloud architecture (Groq + Upstash). Features semantic search, dietary filtering, and personalized recommendations.

projects.name: VerifyIt
projects.description: Cybersecurity application designed to detect and prevent online fraud through intelligent verification systems. Focuses on protecting users from common cyber threats including phishing, scams, and identity theft.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive fraud detection system that helps users verify the authenticity of online interactions. Built with modern web technologies and security best practices, VerifyIt provides real-time threat analysis and user protection mechanisms.

projects.name: Cyber Awareness Guide Website
projects.description: Educational platform designed to raise cybersecurity awareness and teach best practices for online safety. Provides comprehensive guides, interactive tutorials, and real-world case studies.
projects.longDescription: An educational website focused on making cybersecurity knowledge accessible to everyone. Features interactive learning modules, practical security tips, and up-to-date threat information to help users protect themselves online.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Professional portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Features integrated Digital Twin chatbot, dark/light mode, and smooth animations powered by Framer Motion.
projects.longDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js 16 and React 19. Demonstrates full-stack development capabilities and design sensibility. Features seamless integration with the Digital Twin MCP Server for AI-powered interactions.
